summary: Verified all 3 bug fixes: 1) Promo banner has no animations 2) Mobile login working correctly 3) Generator buttons (Biblical Map, Quiz Generator, Supply List) all clickable in TOOLS section. Also verified Cross References and Memory Verse display correctly.

minor.issue: Returns 404 for demo-lesson (may be expected - demo lesson has no map data configured)

context_for_next_testing_agent: All reported bugs fixed and verified: Promo banner toned down (no animations), mobile login fixed (useEffect redirect), generator buttons working. The Biblical Map API returns 404 for demo-lesson but this appears to be expected behavior.

pricing_promo_banner_no_animations.notes: Verified via code review (no animate-* classes) and visual inspection. Banner shows 'Launch Special', '20% OFF', '73 spots left' with no bounce/pulse/wiggle/shimmer effects.

mobile_web_login.notes: Mobile viewport (390x844) login flow works correctly. User can fill email/password and submit. Successfully redirects to /lessons page after login.

biblical_map_button.notes: Button visible in TOOLS section of right sidebar. Clickable and toggles active state. API returns 404 for demo-lesson but UI handles it gracefully.

quiz_generator_button.notes: Button visible in TOOLS section. Clickable and toggles active state.

supply_list_button.notes: Button visible in TOOLS section. Clickable and toggles active state.

cross_references_display.notes: Cross References section displays correctly in right sidebar with Matthew 22:37-39, James 2:14-17, 1 John 3:18, Galatians 6:2, Proverbs 3:27.

memory_verse_display.notes: Memory Verse section displays correctly with verse text 'Love your neighbor as yourself' and reference 'Mark 12:31 (NIV)'.
